com.kallasoft.smugmug.api
Class APIConstants

java.lang.Object
  com.kallasoft.smugmug.api.APIConstants

public class APIConstants
extends Object

Class used to provide global constants across the entire API.

This is defined as a class and not an interface in order to support the static initializer used to init the HTTP_CLIENT instance.

Author:
Riyad Kalla

Field Summary
static org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient HTTP_CLIENT
          The singleton reference to the HttpClient used by the kallasoft SmugMug Java API to communicate with the SmugMug server.
static String USER_AGENT
          Used to define the String used for the User-Agent HTTP header reported by the API when it connects to SmugMug.
static String VERSION
          Used to store the current version of the API, for use in other portions of the API like reporting the User-Agent header.

Field Detail

VERSION

public static final String VERSION
Used to store the current version of the API, for use in other portions of the API like reporting the User-Agent header.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

USER_AGENT

public static final String USER_AGENT
Used to define the String used for the User-Agent HTTP header reported by the API when it connects to SmugMug.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

HTTP_CLIENT

public static final org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient HTTP_CLIENT
The singleton reference to the HttpClient used by the kallasoft SmugMug Java API to communicate with the SmugMug server. Having one instance per application is the preferred method.

This instance of HttpClient is configured specifically for safe, optimized, multi-threaded use by a static initializer in this class.

See Also:
HttpClient Performance Guide
Constructor Detail

APIConstants

public APIConstants()
